title: Dazzling Diamond Drops: Modern Telugu Vari (Earrings)
materials: Ethically Sourced Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
G Color). Hyderabadi Polish finish for exceptional luster.
features: Elegant wavy design with prong-set diamonds adding a touch of sparkle. The minimalist design allows for comfortable wear while still making a statement. The design is inspired by the flow of Telugu rivers, adding a subtle cultural touch.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold with brilliant White Diamonds.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for a special occasion. Adds a touch of understated elegance to any outfit.
description: These earrings effortlessly blend modern design with timeless appeal. The high-quality diamonds and 18K gold construction ensure lasting beauty and durability. The comfortable design makes them perfect for all-day wear. A versatile piece that can be dressed up or down, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
